xwikidoc.name: PatientSheet
xwikidoc.creator: XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.content:
{{include document="ClinicalInformationCode.PatientSheetUI" /}}
{{velocity}} #if ("$!{class}" != '') = $doc.name = (% class="twothird-width clear patient-info chapter" %)((( == Patient Information == #if ("$!activeFields.contains('last_name')" != false && "$!activeFields.contains('first_name')" != false) (% class="fieldset" %)((( #__label('last_name' 'section clear' 'Patient name:') #__displayFormatted('half-width' 'last_name') #__displayFormatted('half-width' 'first_name') )))##fieldset #end## display first name / last name #__displayFormatted('2-col' 'date_of_birth' '' 'date' '') #__displayFormatted('2-col' 'gender' 'Sex' 'date' 'group-title') #__displayFormatted('2-col' 'health_card' '' '' '')
#if ("$!activeFields.contains('relative')" != 'false' && ($context.action == 'edit' || ($doc.display('relative') != '' && $doc.display('relative_of') != ''))) (% class="fieldset family_study" %)((( (% class="half-width relative" %)((( #__label('' 'section' 'Family study:') ## $doc.display('relative') ## #__label('relative_of' 'section' 'of')## ))) (% class="half-width relative_of" %)((( #__label('relative_of' 'hint' 'Patient (MRN)') #__display('relative_of') ))) )))##fieldset #end
#if ("$!activeFields.contains('onset')" != 'false') #if ($context.action == 'edit') $doc.display('onset') #else #__displayFormatted('2-col' 'onset' '' '' 'section') #end #end )))##chapter
(% class="clear" %)((()))
#if ($config && "$!{config.getProperty('measurements').value}" == '1') (% class="twothird-width clear measurement-info chapter" %)((( == Growth parameters == #__extradata_displayTable('ClinicalInformationCode.MeasurementsClass' {'counter' : false, 'labels' : true}) )))##chapter #end
(% class="clear clinical-info phenotype-info chapter mandatory" %)((( #__qsBox("$!{class.name}_$!{obj.number}_phenotype") (% class="twothird-width chapter-inner" %)((( (% class="group-title" %) == $!{class.get('phenotype').prettyName} == $doc.display('phenotype')## ))) )))##chapter
(% class="twothird-width clear clinical-info prenatal_phenotype-info chapter" %)((( == $!{class.get('prenatal_phenotype').prettyName} == $doc.display('prenatal_phenotype') )))##chapter
(% class="twothird-width clear clinical-info family_history-info chapter" %)((( == $!{class.get('family_history').prettyName} == ((( $doc.display('family_history') #__displayIfNotEmpty('family_comments') ))) )))##chapter
(% class="clear chapter" %)((( (% class="twothird-width diagnosis-info chapter-inner"%)((( == Diagnosis == #__displayIfNotEmpty2Col('omim_id' '' '' '') (((#__displayIfNotEmpty('comments')))) ))) #__ncbiSBox("$!{class.name}_$!{obj.number}_phenotype") (% class="clear" %)((())) )))##chapter
#if ($config && "$!{config.getProperty('variants').value}" == '1') (% class="clear variant-info chapter" %)((( == Variants == #__variant_displayVariants() )))##chapter #end
#end## class exists {{/velocity}}
